data.text:
ãæå¥½æ³ä½ ã’I Miss You’ is included in Taiwanese indie band èæç»¿ Sodagreen‘s eponymous album, released on June 17th. The band’s vocalist å´éå³° Wu Qingfeng aka Wu Tsing-Fong said he wrote this song five years ago and experienced an emotional meltdown when recording it. This year, this song was chosen to be the theme song of the movie Tiny Times directed by Young-adult Fiction writer Guo Jingming. At time of translation, this song has generated 770,516 listens on Xiami.
